org.wso2.carbon.gateway.httploadbalancer.algorithm.weighted

Class WeightedRoundRobin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.gateway.httploadbalancer.algorithm.weighted.WeightedRoundRobin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoadBalancingAlgorithm, WeightedAlgorithm

    public class WeightedRoundRobin
extends java.lang.Object
implements WeightedAlgorithm
    Implementation of weighted Round Robin Algorithm.

    User has to define weights for each endpoint. By default weight is 1.

      • removeLBOutboundEndpoint

        public void removeLBOutboundEndpoint(LBOutboundEndpoint lbOutboundEndpoint)
        Specified by:
        removeLBOutboundEndpoint in interface LoadBalancingAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        lbOutboundEndpoint - outboundEndpoint to be removed from existing list.

        This method will be used to remove an unHealthyEndpoint.

        NOTE: for this algorithm, we are not removing from map. But, we are removing from list.

        We are doing this because, for health check we need it.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Each implementation of LB algorithm will have certain values pertained to it. (Eg: Round robin keeps track of index of OutboundEndpoint). Implementation of this method will resetHealthPropertiesToDefault them.

        NOTE: In this case weightsWindow is dependant on no of endpoints. So, we have to take care of that too.

        Specified by:
        reset in interface LoadBalancingAlgorithm

        Returns:
        Object used for locking.
